name: Alice Escaped! Bundle
description:
Explore the stylish world of Wonderland with Usada and Kotora as they search for a mysterious girl named Alice! A Metroidvania action game with a rich, exhilarating battle system all wrapped up in cuteness!

The Alice Escaped! Original Soundtrack features 11 BGM tracks by MasKaleido and GUCCI of SOUND HOLIC.

TRACK LISTING
  1. The Meadow of Encounters 2:35
  2. The Lost Forest 3:15
  3. The Big Mansion 2:12
  4. The Mad Tea Party 2:12
  5. Castle Garden 3:14
  6. Prison 2:54
  7. Castle Hall 3:29
  8. Friendship 2:05
  9. Cheshire 2:35
  10. Queen Isabella 4:37
  11. Usamura-san 1:52
  12. Usamura-san House 3:02
  13. Hurry up! 1:03

  15. Prologue 3:24
  16. Memory 3:42
